meanings.definition: The act of softening or melting something.
meanings.sent1: The inteneration of the butter made it easy to spread on the toast.
meanings.sent2: After the inteneration of the chocolate, it was smooth and creamy.
meanings.sent3: The inteneration of the ice cream turned it into a delicious treat.
meanings.sent4: Her smile had a warmth that felt like the inteneration of a frozen heart.
meanings.sent5: The inteneration of the cheese made it gooey and irresistible.

meanings.definition: The process of making something tender or mellow.
meanings.sent1: Grandma's inteneration of the meat made it so tender it melted in your mouth.
meanings.sent2: The inteneration of the music filled the room with a soothing melody.
meanings.sent3: The inteneration of the pillow made it the perfect place to rest your head.
meanings.sent4: The inteneration of the colors in the painting gave it a soft, dreamy quality.
meanings.sent5: The inteneration of the fruit brought out its natural sweetness.
